title: Bug 4974: Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When pressing 'Ok', an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. The issue arises when setting the output location and classpath as two separate operations, which results in an illegal state.
EB: In order to avoid this issue, the setting of classpath and output location should be offered as one operation. Additionally, the error message should be improved to say '/xy/src' cannot be nested in '/xy'.
SR: To reproduce the bug, follow these steps: 1. Set the output location and classpath separately. 2. Press 'Ok'. 3. Observe the error message stating 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'.
